item.title: About Me
item.description: Hi, I’m Michael â€” a sophisticated Software Engineer. Michael Abadi Santoso is an iOS Engineer, originally from Indonesia and currently living and working in Thailand at Agoda. The purpose of creating this blog is because I want to give back to the community as I have been taught by other great iOS Developer, and I would like to continue the chains. Besides, one of great way to learn something is by teaching it.
